author: Al Jazeera
title: China's economy dragged into historic slump due to coronavirus - Aljazeera.com
description: China's economy dragged into historic slump due to coronavirus Aljazeera.com China Economy Shrinks for First Time in Decades Amid Virus Outbreak Bloomberg Markets and Finance China’s G.D.P. Shrank in the First Quarter The New York Times China says its economy…
content:
China's economy shrank for the first time since at least 1992 in the first quarter, as the coronavirus outbreak paralysed production and spending, raising pressure on authorities to do more to stop mounting job losses.
Gross domestic product (GDP) fell 6.8 p… [+4266 chars]
